questions.question_text:
An administrator is creating new severs in a public cloud. The workflow creates and application group with three VMs: one web server, one application server and one database server. The three VMs are all accessible via SSH, but the websites shows a 503-error referring to a database issue.
Which of the following is the MOST likely cause of the error?

discussion.content:
I choose C
Minimizing restore time
https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/computer-science/restoration-time#:~:text=Differential%20Backups&text=The%20differential%20backup%20is%20advantageous,the%20most%20recent%20differential%20backup.

Correct answer is A.
From the above options, unlike a "regular full back up", when you perform "synthetic full backup", it does not retrieve data from the source. Instead, it synthesizes a full backup from data you already have in the backup repository.

what bi-weekly here means? twice a week? every 2 weeks? 
but no matter what, it can't be "incremental"

they are just asking to minimize the restore time. 

Going with C.

questions.question_text:
A customer has indicated that bi-weekly full backups are taking too long to complete.
Which of the following would be the BEST action if minimizing restore time is very important to the customer?

choices.A: Change the backups to synthetic full backups.
choices.D: Change the schedule of full backups to start earlier.
choices.C: Change the second full backup in a week to differential.
choices.B: Change the second full backup in a week to incremental.

questions.question_text:
A facilities management company uses a private cloud that bursts to a public cloud at times. The CSA is asked to check the amount of storage that is used when the organization is overutilizing on-premises resources.
Which of the following should the CSA check?

choices.B: Check storage utilization in the public cloud.
choices.A: Ensure deduplication is enabled on all storage volumes.
choices.D: Confirm storage utilization in the public cloud backup environment.
choices.C: Verify storage utilization in the private cloud.

discussion.content: generally we assume CSP has unlimited resources. the CSA need to check private cloud's disk utilization which my trigger bursting. so C.

questions.question_text: Cloud developers are experiencing a delay caused by the static code review before each deployment. The security operator and developer must address the issue without cutting corners with security testing. Which of the following would BEST address the delay issue?

choices.B: Perform the static code analysis earlier in the SDLC.
choices.C: Perform a penetration test instead of a static code analysis.
choices.D: Replace the static code analysis with a vulnerability analysis.
choices.A: Replace the static code analysis with hardening techniques.

discussion.content:
The whole point of SDLC is to manage the projects better. either by moving the date or the task itself.

Going with B.

I think it is D.
It would not be A because that would be cutting a corner in "security testing".
It would not be B because you do not want to perform testing while a software is being developed. It can pass a test, and then the developers add new code later and that same test could fail. It also uses the same method which would not save any time. A vulnerability test is a good automated test to test software

comments.content: Of course not, SDLC includes testing, so B is the right answer. You test the code in code repositories branches, so there are no problems as you mentioned
I agree. Creating tenants for each department and creating ACLs can be used for separation.
PKI certificates can also be used for authentication. In this case, the user still has a private key but also has a certificate associated with the key.

questions.question_text: An engineer is responsible for managing a private cloud environment at a software company. Company developers perform all programming in the cloud environment. There are two departments working on a highly classified product that now requires dedicated resources, which cannot be viewed or accessed by other departments in the cloud environment. Which of the following should the engineer perform to ensure the requirements are met? (Choose three.)
